dmca.title: Copyright
dmca.body:
http://www.chinats.com/baotou/baotou639.htm
http://www.chinats.com/beijing/beijing9.htm
http://www.chinats.com/changsha/changsha655.htm
http://www.chinats.com/haikou/attr03.htm
http://www.chinats.com/haikou/attr05.htm
http://www.chinats.com/haikou/attr06.htm
http://www.chinats.com/hongkong/hongkong1448.htm
http://www.chinats.com/wuxi/attr06.htm
http://www.chinats.com/nanjing/nanjing2096.htm
http://http://www.chinats.com/nanjing/nanjing2095.htm
http://www.chinats.com/nanjing/nanjing922.htm
http://www.chinats.com/nanjing/nanjing920.htm
http://www.chinats.com/nanjing/nanjing913.htm
http://www.chinats.com/nanjing/nanjing911.htm
http://www.chinats.com/nanjing/nanjing910.htm
http://www.chinats.com/nanjing/nanjing908.htm
http://www.chinats.com/nanjing/nanjing907.htm


**This complainant already has a signature on file with us. Below is the latest email request:

DATE: August 24, 2007

Dear Google, Inc.



1. I, the webmaster of www.travelchinaguide.com, am on behalf of our
company, Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd. I am looking forward for your
concerns about the websites copied the below pages from our website.



The offender is www.chinats.com. They copied *17* pages of contents from
our
website. So we are here to ask for your investigation and removal of the
infringing pages.



2. Hereunder is the detailed information on the pages they have copied
from
our website:



(1)Search Query "baotou chinats"

our Copyrighted page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20020815110437/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/inner_mongolia/baotou/genghis_khan.htm
(our August 2002 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://www.chinats.com/baotou/baotou639.htm (Their first three paragraphs
copied our first two paragraphs.)



(2)Search Query "temple of heaven"

our Copyrighted page:

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/beijing/heaven/

Infringing Web Page:

http://www.chinats.com/beijing/beijing9.htm (Their third paragraph copied
our third
paragraph.)< http://www.travelchinaguide.com/china_great_wall/scene/beijing/jinshanling.htm >



(3)Search Query "hunan provincial museum"

our Copyrighted page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20020815105045/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/hunan/changsha/museum.htm
( our August 2002 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://www.chinats.com/changsha/changsha655.htm



(4)Search Query "dongjiao coconut"

our Copyrighted page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20021008055714/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/hainan/haikou/dongjiao.htm
(our October 2002 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://www.chinats.com/haikou/attr03.htm



(5)Search Query "nanli lake"

our Copyrighted page:

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/hainan/haikou/nanli.htm

Infringing Web Page:

http://www.chinats.com/haikou/attr05.htm



(6)Search Query "shimei bay"

our Copyrighted page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20030405062451/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/hainan/haikou/shimei-bay.htm
(our April 2003 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://www.chinats.com/haikou/attr06.htm



(7)Search Query " http://www.chinats.com/hongkong/hongkong1448.htm"

our Copyrighted page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20021219193001/http://travelchinaguide.com/attraction/hongkong/island/bay.htm
(our December 2002 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://www.chinats.com/hongkong/hongkong1448.htm (Their second and third
paragraphs copied our second and third paragraphs in turn.)



(8)Search Query " www.chinats.com/wuxi/attr06.htm"

our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20020815130459/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/jiangsu/wuxi/plum_garden.htm
(our August 2002 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://www.chinats.com/wuxi/attr06.htm



(9)Search Query "Confucius Temple"

our Copyrighted page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20011114214428/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/jiangsu/nanjing/fuzimiao.htm
(our November 2001 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://www.chinats.com/nanjing/nanjing2096.htm



(10)Search Query "The Memorial Hall to the Victims in the Nanjing
Massacre"


our Copyrighted page:

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/jiangsu/nanjing/memorial-hall-nanjing-massacre.htm

Infringing Web Page:

http://http://www.chinats.com/nanjing/nanjing2095.htm (Their second, third
and fourth paragraphs copied our third, fourth and fifth paragraphs
respectively.)



(11) Search Query "Qixia Mount"

our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20011114210327/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/jiangsu/nanjing/qixia_temple.htm
(our November 2001 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://www.chinats.com/nanjing/nanjing922.htm (Their second and third
paragraph copied our second and third paragraph.)



(12)Search Query "zhanyuan"

our Copyrighted page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20010818151535/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/jiangsu/nanjing/zhanyuan.htm
(our August 2001 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://www.chinats.com/nanjing/nanjing920.htm (Their second paragraph
copied our old version.)



(13)Search Query "qinhuai river"

our Copyrighted page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20010617030152/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/jiangsu/nanjing/qinhuai.htm(June
2001 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://www.chinats.com/nanjing/nanjing913.htm (Their first and third
paragraphs copied our first paragraph.)



(14)Search Query "Nanjing museum"

our Copyrighted page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20010617025932/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/jiangsu/nanjing/nanjing_museum.htm(our
June 2001 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://www.chinats.com/nanjing/nanjing911.htm (Their first two paragraphs
copied our old version.)



(15)Search Query "Nanjing Yangtze River Grand Bridge"

http://web.archive.org/web/20010617021950/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/jiangsu/nanjing/bridge.htm(our
June 2001 version)

http://www.chinats.com/nanjing/nanjing910.htm



(16)Search Query "The Ming Xiaoling Mausoleum"

our Copyrighted page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20010818144956/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/jiangsu/nanjing/ming_xiaoling.htm
(our August 2001 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://www.chinats.com/nanjing/nanjing908.htm



(17)Search Query " Purple Mountain Observatory"

our Copyrighted page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20020815130110/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/jiangsu/nanjing/zijinshan.htm
(our August 2002 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://www.chinats.com/nanjing/nanjing907.htm (Their last four parts
copied
our last four parts.)


3. My contact information:
[private]
[private]
www.travelchinaguide.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.

[private]

[private]

Xi'an, Shaanxi, [private], P.R.C.

4. The contact info of the copyright offender www.chinats.com is:

Tel: [private], +[private]
Fax: +[private]

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above on the infringing web page is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized
to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly
infringed.


Thank you very much!

Yours sincerely,
[private]
